headline: The Odd Couple
abstract: James Mann’s “The Great Rift” describes the up-and-down relationship of two men who shaped American foreign policy for a generation.
lead_paragraph: THE GREAT RIFTDick Cheney, Colin Powell, and the Broken Friendship That Defined an EraBy James Mann
keywords: The Great Rift: Dick Cheney, Colin Powell, and the Broken Friendship That Defined an Era (Book)
United States Defense and Military Forces
